Name: The Web
Review Text: It's just not the friendly place. But very near to Central Station. You can have 1 or 2 beers here. Short staying is perfect.

Name: The Web
Review Text: Though many bars closed and gay live in Amsterdam has changed. New bars open and some old bars are still there. Bar The Web sails with the tides. Nice locals and gay tourists making the effort. Play rooms. Smoking area. Sympathetic staff. Special events.

Name: The Web
Review Text: Wow. What a horrible place this is. We walked in and started to make our way upstairs (assuming there was a bar up there), and a bartender approaches us rudely and yells, "This is a bar, not a museum!" Great way to greet a first-time guest. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Web

Name: The Web
Review Text: Jeez. My favorite man's bar in Europe. Four storeys of fun (all sorts), from ground level bar to rooftop patio. Been going since '94. Haven't been in a while. Hot, laid back guys in relaxed atomosphere. Sprawling play Labrynith upstairs ‚Ä¶
